This is a nit, but it'd be cleaner to only handle fetching the add-on in the promise, and leaving the rest of the logic outside:

const addon = await new Promise(resolve => AddonManager.getAddonByID(id, resolve));
if (addon === null) {
  throw new Error(`No add-on with ID ${id} found!`);
} else {
  addon.uninstall();
}
